name: Iron Ball Ride 2
description:
Long-awaited sequel of the rolling ball platformer Iron Ball Ride!

A new road full of unfriendly and unexpected obstacles lies ahead! Ready for this new challenge?


Features:

• Easy, one-finger swipe ball control
• Unlimited opportunities to replay a level without penalty
• Multiple paths to success on some challenges
• Inventive and more treacherous tasks at every turn
• Ad-free interface suitable for kids 9+ and kids at heart
